Ipswich Mobile Library Route 4

Contact us:

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Route 4 Town/village Location Time

MIP/4B East Bergholt Constable Hall 0955 – 1100
MIP/4C Cattawade Old School 1110 – 1125
MIP/4D Brantham Palfrey Heights 1130 – 1145
MIP/4E Brantham Ivy Villas 1150 – 1210
MIP/4F Brantham Birch Drive 1215 – 1245
MIP/4G Brantham Valley Close 1350 – 1405
MIP/4H Brantham The Poplars 1410 – 1425
MIP/4I East Bergholt Broom Knoll 1430 – 1500
MIP/4J East Bergholt South View 1505 – 1520
MIP/4K East Bergholt Red Lion 1530 – 1630

Calling every 4 weeks on Fridays:

2016: 15 January, 12 February, 11 March, 8 April, 6 May, 3 June, 1 July, 29 July, 26 August, 23 September, 21 October, 18 November, 16 December

2017: 13 January
